                                                                                                                        <a href="javascript:void(0);" onclick="javascript:window.open('https://service.account.weibo.com/reportspam?rid=IBCxtzX3a&amp;from=10106&amp;type=1&amp;url=%2Frmrb&amp;bottomnav=1&amp;wvr=5', 'newwindow', 'height=700, width=550, toolbar =yes, menubar=no, scrollbars=yes, resizable=yes, location=no, status=no');">投诉</a>
                                                                                                            </span>
                            </li>
                                                                        </ul>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
                <div class="WB_face W_fl">
            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民日报"><img usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.28.0.969.969.1024/a716fd45ly8gdijd1zmonj20sa0saaby.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609515125&amp;ssig=i3ZjX1S%2FIC" width="50" height="50" alt="人民日报" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>
                    </div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4489662838568472" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IBCxtzX3a?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-03 16:28" date="1585902497000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4489662838568472:fromprofile"> 2020-4-3 16:28</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%90%89%E6%9E%97%E6%B2%99%E5%B0%98%E6%9A%B4%E5%A4%A9%E7%A9%BA%E7%9E%AC%E9%97%B4%E5%8F%98%E9%BB%91%23&amp;from=default">#吉林沙尘暴天空瞬间变黑#</a>】4月3日，吉林白城多地出现沙尘暴，整个天空瞬间变黑。沙尘暴来袭，吓坏当地市民，赶紧跑回屋内关闭门窗。据白城气象台大风蓝色预警，未来24小时当地将出现大风浮尘，瞬间风力可达6级以上。 <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4489662838568472:1034-video:1034%3A4489647850455067:page_100206_home:2803301701:4489662838568472:2803301701" title="封面新闻的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6ZTvN48" alt="http://t.cn/A6ZTvN48" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>封面新闻的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%89%B9%E6%9C%97%E6%99%AE%E8%AF%81%E5%AE%9E%E5%B0%86%E5%87%BA%E5%8F%B0%E4%BD%A9%E6%88%B4%E5%8F%A3%E7%BD%A9%E8%A7%84%E5%AE%9A%23&amp;from=default">#特朗普证实将出台佩戴口罩规定#</a>，称围巾很多方面比口罩好】美国总统特朗普2日在白宫发布会上表示，即将出台关于佩戴口罩的规定，但不会是“强制的”。他还表示：“人们想戴口罩就戴。在很多方面，围巾（比口罩）更好，围巾更厚。”<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4489661114556587:2017607-video:2017607%3A4489549053886478:page_100206_home:2803301701:4489661114556587:2803301701" title="海客新闻的秒拍视频" href="http://t.cn/A6Zj0YyJ" alt="http://t.cn/A6Zj0YyJ" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>海客新闻的秒拍视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E7%9B%B4%E6%92%AD%23&amp;from=default">#人民直播#</a>：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B9%96%E5%8C%97%E4%BB%8B%E7%BB%8D%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E9%98%B2%E6%8E%A7%E5%B7%A5%E4%BD%9C%23&amp;from=default">#湖北介绍疫情防控工作#</a>】4月3日下午，湖北省新型冠状病毒肺炎疫情防控工作指挥部召开第63场新闻发布会，介绍统筹推进疫情防控和农业生产情况，并答记者问。<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E6%97%A5%E6%8A%A5?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=人民日报">@人民日报</a> 正在直播↓一起关注。 <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4489655917867058:1034-video:1034%3A4489668394418184:page_100206_home:2803301701:4489655917867058:2803301701" title="人民日报的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6ZTAO36" alt="http://t.cn/A6ZTAO36" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民日报的微博视频</a> . ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%92%9F%E5%8D%97%E5%B1%B1%E7%A7%B0%E6%97%A0%E4%BA%BA%E8%83%BD%E9%A2%84%E6%B5%8B%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E6%98%AF%E5%90%A6%E4%BC%9A%E6%AF%8F%E5%B9%B4%E6%9A%B4%E5%8F%91%23&amp;from=default">#钟南山称无人能预测疫情是否会每年暴发#</a>】新冠病毒是否会和人类长期共存？钟南山在接受采访时将其与SARS作了比较，并表示没有人能够估计新冠肺炎是否会像流感那样每年都暴发。<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4489653819805537:1034-video:1034%3A4489334615900188:page_100206_home:2803301701:4489653819805537:2803301701" title="深圳卫视深视新闻的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6ZWT6DL" alt="http://t.cn/A6ZWT6DL" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>深圳卫视深视新闻的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                                <a name="4489650603426229" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IBCdKenjL?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-03 15:39" date="1585899579000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4489650603426229:fromprofile"> 2020-4-3 15:39</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%BE%BD%E5%AE%81%E5%BC%80%E5%AD%A6%E6%97%B6%E9%97%B4%23&amp;from=default">#辽宁开学时间#</a>：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%BE%BD%E5%AE%814%E6%9C%8815%E6%97%A5%E9%AB%98%E4%B8%89%E5%BC%80%E5%AD%A6%23&amp;from=default">#辽宁4月15日高三开学#</a>】经辽宁省疫情防控指挥部研究决定，并报教育部备案，2020年4月15日辽宁全省普通高中高三年级省域内同步开学。初中三年级为第二批开学，实行同一市域同步开学，由各市确定开学时间。<a suda-uatrack="key=minicard&amp;value=pagelink_minicard_click" title="网页链接" href="http://t.cn/A6ZThrNZ" alt="http://t.cn/A6ZThrNZ" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_link">O</i>网页链接</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【人民直播：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%9B%BD%E5%8A%A1%E9%99%A2%E8%81%94%E9%98%B2%E8%81%94%E6%8E%A7%E6%9C%BA%E5%88%B6%E5%8F%91%E5%B8%83%E4%BC%9A%23&amp;from=default">#国务院联防联控机制发布会#</a>】国务院联防联控机制定于15时召开新闻发布会，介绍<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%A7%91%E6%8A%80%E5%88%9B%E6%96%B0%E6%94%AF%E6%92%91%E5%A4%8D%E5%B7%A5%E5%A4%8D%E4%BA%A7%23&amp;from=default">#科技创新支撑复工复产#</a>和经济平稳运行工作情况，请科技部相关司局负责人等回答媒体提问。<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E6%97%A5%E6%8A%A5?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=人民日报">@人民日报</a> 现场直播↓↓一起关注！ <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4489640662595203:1034-video:1034%3A4489655169515547:page_100206_home:2803301701:4489640662595203:2803301701" title="人民日报的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6ZYdOFt" alt="http://t.cn/A6ZYdOFt" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民日报的微博视频</a> . ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【5G+AI！跟着无人车<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BA%91%E9%80%9B%E6%B1%9F%E6%B1%89%E8%B7%AF%E6%AD%A5%E8%A1%8C%E8%A1%97%23&amp;from=default">#云逛江汉路步行街#</a>】目前，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E6%B1%9F%E6%B1%89%E8%B7%AF%E6%AD%A5%E8%A1%8C%E8%A1%97%E5%95%86%E4%B8%9A%E5%B7%B2%E9%87%8D%E6%96%B0%E5%90%AF%E5%8A%A8%23&amp;from=default">#武汉江汉路步行街商业已重新启动#</a>。人民直播利用5G+AI技术带你“云逛街”。无人车陪你一起见证武汉重启！正在直播，一起来看↓↓ <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4489635276830340:1034-video:1034%3A4489714921832452:page_100206_home:2803301701:4489635276830340:2803301701" title="人民日报的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6ZYuTll" alt="http://t.cn/A6ZYuTll" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民日报的微博视频</a> . ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%B1%B1%E4%B8%9C%E5%BC%80%E5%AD%A6%E6%97%B6%E9%97%B4%23&amp;from=default">#山东开学时间#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%B1%B1%E4%B8%9C%E9%AB%98%E4%B8%894%E6%9C%8815%E6%97%A5%E6%AD%A3%E5%BC%8F%E5%BC%80%E5%AD%A6%23&amp;from=default">#山东高三4月15日正式开学#</a>，初三顺延一周】①山东高中（含中职）学校毕业年级4月15日正式开学；②初中学校毕业年级原则上按顺延一周开学做准备，具体开学时间由各市按照“市域同步”的要求研究确定；③高中（含中职）、初中学校其他年级和小学、幼儿园、特殊教育学校、高等学校开学时 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IBBIKEEqE" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4489631389688532:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4489631389688532&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                        </li>

                                            <a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt2" action-type="fl_comment" action-data="ouid=2803301701&amp;location=profile&amp;comment_type=0" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=comment:4489612917217081"><span class="pos"><span class="line S_line1" node-type="comment_btn_text"><span><em class="W_ficon ficon_repeat S_ficon"></em><em>1309</em></span></span></span></a>
                                        <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_line1"></i><em class="S_bg1_br"></em></span></span>
                </li>
                <li class="">
                    <!--cuslike用于前端判断是否显示个性赞，1:显示-->
                    <a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt2" action-type="fl_like" action-data="version=mini&amp;qid=heart&amp;mid=4489612917217081&amp;loc=profile&amp;cuslike=1&amp;hide_multi_attitude=1&amp;liked=0" title="赞" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=like"><span class="pos"><span class="line S_line1">
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                <span node-type="like_status" class=""><em class="W_ficon ficon_praised S_txt2">ñ</em><em>7908</em></span>                        </span></span></a>
                    <span class="arrow" node-type="cmtarrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_line1"></i><em class="S_bg1_br"></em></span></span>
                </li>
            </ul>
        </div>
    </div>
            <div node-type="feed_list_repeat" class="WB_feed_repeat S_bg1" style="display: none;"></div>
    </div>

                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4489603375090010" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IBAZzlm8W?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-03 12:32" date="1585888320000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4489603375090010:fromprofile"> 2020-4-3 12:32</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%87%91%E6%98%9F%E5%90%88%E6%98%B4%E6%98%9F%E5%9B%A2%E4%BB%8A%E6%97%A5%E7%99%BB%E5%9C%BA%23&amp;from=default">#金星合昴星团今日登场#</a>！转存<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%9B%9B%E6%9C%88%E5%A4%A9%E8%B1%A1%E6%97%B6%E9%97%B4%E8%A1%A8%23&amp;from=default">#四月天象时间表#</a>】4月3日，金星合昴星团将“首发”登场。今晚，明亮的金星与散发着蓝色光芒的昴星团争相闪耀、交相辉映；4月8日，迎来2020年“最大满月”；4月15日凌晨，月亮将先后与木星、土星、火星会合，四颗明亮天体“相依相伴”；4月22日，天琴座流星雨将迎来极大 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IBAZzlm8W" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4489603375090010:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4489603375090010&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【广东一<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%94%B7%E5%AD%90%E4%BE%AE%E8%BE%B1%E8%A5%BF%E6%98%8C%E7%81%AB%E7%81%BE%E7%89%BA%E7%89%B2%E9%98%9F%E5%91%98%E8%A2%AB%E8%A1%8C%E6%8B%98%23&amp;from=default">#男子侮辱西昌火灾牺牲队员被行拘#</a>十日】4月1日，<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E5%87%89%E5%B1%B1%E7%BD%91%E8%AD%A6%E5%B7%A1%E6%9F%A5%E6%89%A7%E6%B3%95?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=凉山网警巡查执法">@凉山网警巡查执法</a> 接到多名网民举报称：网民“落叶渐知秋”（后更名“殘留余溫飘香”）（冯某某，男，24岁，广东梅州人）在《新浪微博》发布多条言论侮辱四川西昌森林火灾牺牲队员，被其他网民截图后大面积传播，造成了极其恶劣的社会影响，引 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IBAV4og7P" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4489600585781861:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4489600585781861&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                <a name="4489596580781702" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IBAOC3hm6?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-03 12:05" date="1585886700000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4489596580781702:fromprofile"> 2020-4-3 12:05</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

                                                                                                                        【教育部辟谣：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%236%E6%9C%88%E4%BB%BD%E8%8B%B1%E8%AF%AD%E5%9B%9B%E5%85%AD%E7%BA%A7%E8%80%83%E8%AF%95%E5%8F%96%E6%B6%88%E4%B8%8D%E5%AE%9E%23&amp;from=default">#6月份英语四六级考试取消不实#</a>】针对近日“原6月份大学英语四六级考试取消，与下半年考试合并”的传言，记者3日从教育部考试中心证实，教育部考试中心已于2月底发布公告，推迟全国范围内2020年上半年全国大学英语四六级考试（CET）、全国大学英语四六级口语考试（CET-SET）、全国外语水 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IBAtqxdQH" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4489583447918063:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4489583447918063&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%90%AE%E7%90%AE%E8%8E%B2%E8%8E%B2%E5%AE%B8%E5%AE%B8%23&amp;from=default">#琮琮莲莲宸宸#</a>！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%9D%AD%E5%B7%9E2022%E4%BA%9A%E8%BF%90%E4%BC%9A%E5%90%89%E7%A5%A5%E7%89%A9%23&amp;from=default">#杭州2022亚运会吉祥物#</a>发布<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/8a/2018new_xin_org.png" title="[心]" alt="[心]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】今天，2022年第19届亚运会吉祥物发布，吉祥物是一组名为“江南忆”的机器人。三个吉祥物分别取名“琮琮”、“莲莲”、“宸宸”。“琮琮”代表世界遗产良渚古城遗址，“莲莲”代表世界遗产西湖，“宸宸”代表世界遗产京杭大运河。你喜欢吗？ ​​​​                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%2331%E7%9C%81%E5%8C%BA%E5%B8%82%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E2%E4%BE%8B%E6%9C%AC%E5%9C%9F%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#31省区市新增2例本土病例#</a>，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E2%E6%9C%AC%E5%9C%9F%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E5%9D%87%E4%B8%BA%E5%A2%83%E5%A4%96%E8%BE%93%E5%85%A5%E5%85%B3%E8%81%94%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#新增2本土病例均为境外输入关联病例#</a>】4月2日0—24时，31个省（自治区、直辖市）和新疆生产建设兵团报告新增2例本土病例（辽宁1例，广东1例）。其中，辽宁省的新增1例，为大连市境外输入关联病例，属普通型病例。广东省的新增1例，为广州报告境外输入关联病例。 ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%2331%E7%9C%81%E5%8C%BA%E5%B8%82%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E29%E4%BE%8B%E5%A2%83%E5%A4%96%E8%BE%93%E5%85%A5%23&amp;from=default">#31省区市新增29例境外输入#</a>】4月2日0—24时，31个省（自治区、直辖市）和新疆生产建设兵团报告新增确诊病例31例，其中29例为境外输入病例，2例为本土病例（辽宁1例，广东1例）。境外输入现有确诊病例710例（含重症病例19例），现有疑似病例135例。累计确诊病例870例，累计治愈出院病例160例，累计死 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IBA2YA64P" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4489567048603171:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4489567048603171&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%2331%E7%9C%81%E5%8C%BA%E5%B8%82%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A31%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#31省区市新增确诊31例#</a>：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%2331%E7%9C%81%E5%8C%BA%E5%B8%82%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E2%E4%BE%8B%E6%9C%AC%E5%9C%9F%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#31省区市新增2例本土病例#</a>】4月2日0—24时，31个省（自治区、直辖市）和新疆生产建设兵团报告新增确诊病例31例，其中29例为境外输入病例，2例为本土病例（辽宁1例，广东1例）；新增死亡病例4例（湖北4例）；新增疑似病例12例，均为境外输入病例。<br>　　当日新增治愈出院病例 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IBzYa7duh" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4489564061720145:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4489564061720145&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

<!-- 微博心情，独立于标准的ul节点 -->
                    <div class="WB_media_wrap clearfix" node-type="feed_list_media_prev">
        <div class="media_box">
            <!--判断图片的个数，渲染图片-->
                            <!--图片个数等于1，只显示图片-->
                
				 		    <!--picture_count == 1-->
    <ul class="WB_media_a  WB_media_a_m1 clearfix" action-data="isPrivate=0&amp;relation=0&amp;clear_picSrc=%2F%2Fwx3.sinaimg.cn%2Fmw690%2Fa716fd45ly1gdgh0wwchmj20u01ekgzf.jpg">

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【听到泪目！脸上还有来不及擦的灰，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%A5%BF%E6%98%8C%E6%95%91%E7%81%AB%E6%AD%A6%E8%AD%A6%E5%94%B1%E8%B5%B7%E5%B0%91%E5%B9%B4%23&amp;from=default">#西昌救火武警唱起少年#</a>】林火终于扑灭，被烟熏的黑乎乎的脸上终于露出笑容。逆火而上，他们是中国军人；而此刻，他们都还只是一群十九岁二十多岁的小小少年。“我还是曾经那个少年，没有一丝丝改变”。网友：这是我听过最感动的一首《少年》<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/6e/2018new_leimu_org.png" title="[泪]" alt="[泪]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;"> ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IBzPk36w2" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4489558580740034:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4489558580740034&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【细理游子绪，菰米似故乡！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%A4%9A%E5%9C%B0%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E7%95%99%E5%AD%A6%E7%94%9F%E6%99%92%E5%81%A5%E5%BA%B7%E5%8C%85%23&amp;from=default">#多地中国留学生晒健康包#</a>】近日，不少留学生收到了来自祖国的温暖，他们纷纷晒出自己收到的健康包。据了解，我国各使馆领馆通过各种渠道为留学人员发放“健康包”，源源不断向中国留学生调配50万份健康包，包括1100多万份口罩、50万份消毒物品及防疫指南等物资。网友：祖国 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IBzq0EGKq" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4489542889697446:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4489542889697446&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                <a name="4489535356632694" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IBzdRrPsW?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-03 08:01" date="1585872103000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4489535356632694:fromprofile"> 2020-4-3 08:01</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【国务院公告：2020年4月<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%234%E6%97%A5%E4%B8%BE%E8%A1%8C%E5%85%A8%E5%9B%BD%E6%80%A7%E5%93%80%E6%82%BC%E6%B4%BB%E5%8A%A8%23&amp;from=default">#4日举行全国性哀悼活动#</a>】为表达全国各族人民对抗击新冠肺炎疫情斗争牺牲烈士和逝世同胞的深切哀悼，国务院发布公告，决定2020年4月4日举行全国性哀悼活动。在此期间，全国和驻外使领馆下半旗志哀，全国停止公共娱乐活动。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%234%E6%9C%884%E6%97%A510%E6%97%B6%E8%B5%B7%E5%85%A8%E5%9B%BD%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E9%BB%98%E5%93%803%E5%88%86%E9%92%9F%23&amp;from=default">#4月4日10时起全国人民默哀3分钟#</a>，汽车、火车、舰船 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IBzdRrPsW" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4489535356632694:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4489535356632694&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4489527878049440" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IBz1NxM1G?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-03 07:32" date="1585870320000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4489527878049440:fromprofile"> 2020-4-3 07:32</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23108%E4%BA%BA%E5%AE%8C%E6%88%90%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E7%96%AB%E8%8B%97%E6%8E%A5%E7%A7%8D%23&amp;from=default">#108人完成新冠疫苗接种#</a>：18人结束隔离观察回家】截至4月2日，在汉进行的新冠疫苗一期临床试验的108位受试者均已完成接种，其中18位志愿者结束隔离。每一位解除隔离时都要拍CT，目前身体状况均良好。108位志愿者中，从60后到00后都有。老师、大学生、退伍军人、创业者、企业管理者，职业不一。谢谢 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IBz1NxM1G" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4489527878049440:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4489527878049440&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%85%A8%E7%90%83%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E5%8F%91%E7%97%85%E6%95%B0%E8%B6%85%E7%99%BE%E4%B8%87%23&amp;from=default">#全球新冠肺炎发病数超百万#</a>，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%85%A8%E7%90%83%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E6%AD%BB%E4%BA%A1%E8%B6%855%E4%B8%87%23&amp;from=default">#全球新冠肺炎死亡超5万#</a>】据美国约翰斯•霍普金斯大学发布的全球新冠肺炎实时查询系统显示，截至美国东部时间4月2日下午4时，全球新冠肺炎发病数超过百万，达到了1002159例。死亡病例超过5万，达到51485例。治愈数超20万例，为208949例。（人民日报记者张梦旭） ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%BE%8E%E5%9B%BD%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E8%B6%8524%E4%B8%87%23&amp;from=default">#美国新冠肺炎确诊病例超24万#</a>，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%BE%8E%E5%9B%BD%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E6%97%A5%E5%A2%9E%E8%B6%853%E4%B8%87%23&amp;from=default">#美国新冠肺炎日增超3万#</a>】据美国约翰斯·霍普金斯大学发布的全球新冠肺炎数据实时统计系统，截至美国东部时间4月2日晚6时，全美共报告新冠肺炎确诊242182例，死亡5758例，治愈8889例。过去24小时，新增确诊33111例，新增死亡1001例。（张梦旭） ​​​​                                            </div>

        </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【世卫组织：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E4%BB%A5%E5%A4%96%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E8%B6%8580%E4%B8%87%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#中国以外新冠肺炎确诊病例超80万例#</a>】当地时间4月2日，世界卫生组织发布第73期新冠肺炎疫情报告。报告显示，截至欧洲中部时间4月2日10时（北京时间2日16时），<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%85%A8%E7%90%83%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B896450%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#全球新冠肺炎确诊病例896450例#</a>，较前一日增加72839例；死亡45526例，较前一日增加4924例。中国之外新冠肺炎确诊病例超过80万 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IByDHgoqv" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4489512933907147:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4489512933907147&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%84%8F%E5%A4%A7%E5%88%A9%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A4668%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#意大利新增确诊4668例#</a>，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%84%8F%E5%A4%A7%E5%88%A9%E7%B4%AF%E8%AE%A1%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E115242%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#意大利累计确诊新冠肺炎115242例#</a>】根据意大利民事保护部门公布的最新数据，截至当地时间4月2日18时，意大利现有新冠肺炎确诊病例83049例，死亡13915例，治愈18278例，累计确诊病例115242例，较4月1日18时新增确诊4668例，新增760例死亡病例。（人民日报记者韩硕） ​​​​                                            </div>

            <ul>

                                                                                                                    <li><a href="javascript:void(0)" action-data="id=star_1218&amp;isvip=0" action-type="fl_cardCover" suda-uatrack="key=vip_background&amp;value=feed_background_click" title="用此卡片背景">用此卡片背景</a></li>
                                                                                                                                                                        <li>
                                <span class="hover">
                                                                                                                        <a href="javascript:void(0);" onclick="javascript:window.open('https://service.account.weibo.com/reportspam?rid=IBw17rbHr&amp;from=10106&amp;type=1&amp;url=%2Fp%2Faj%2Fv6%2Fmblog%2Fmbloglist&amp;bottomnav=1&amp;wvr=5', 'newwindow', 'height=700, width=550, toolbar =yes, menubar=no, scrollbars=yes, resizable=yes, location=no, status=no');">投诉</a>

                            </li>
                                                                        </ul>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
                <div class="WB_face W_fl">
            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民日报"><img usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.28.0.969.969.1024/a716fd45ly8gdijd1zmonj20sa0saaby.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609515156&amp;ssig=K8a3qpItc7" width="50" height="50" alt="人民日报" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4489412136479833" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IBw17rbHr?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-02 23:52" date="1585842725000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4489412136479833:fromprofile"> 2020-4-2 23:52</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BD%A0%E5%A5%BD%EF%BC%8C%E6%98%8E%E5%A4%A9%23&amp;from=default">#你好，明天#</a>】多国防疫物资紧缺，我驻外使领馆正想方设法将50万份“健康包”送到海外学子手中。“健康包”不大，却盛满了祖国的牵挂。之前国内抗疫，留学生们心系祖国、捐款捐物；如今海外形势严峻，祖国更是他们的坚强后盾。背靠祖国，再远的距离我们一起风雨同舟，再多的困难我们终将共克时艰！ ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IBw17rbHr" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4489412136479833:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4489412136479833&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4489406931240661" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IBvSJ5cKF?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-02 23:31" date="1585841484000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4489406931240661:fromprofile"> 2020-4-2 23:31</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%B0%A2%E8%B0%A2%E6%AF%8F%E4%B8%AA%E4%BE%9D%E7%84%B6%E5%9D%9A%E5%AE%88%E5%9C%A8%E6%88%98%E7%96%AB%E4%B8%80%E7%BA%BF%E7%9A%84%E4%BD%A0%23&amp;from=default">#谢谢每个依然坚守在战疫一线的你#</a>！】如约绽放的樱花，为武汉的春天按下播放键。这个春天，离不开一群人的逆行与坚守。“为了胜利，我们宁愿迟点回！” 他们中，有留在武汉继续战斗的5位院士，有4000多名军队医护，有守护国门的海关关员、边检民警…他们，护佑着我们的平安。转发，致敬所有努力！ ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【夜读：认清一个人，看这三点就够了】患难时看真情、细节中看修养、利益前看人品。看清一个人，不仅要看他的人品，还要看他的真心和修养。只有和真心实意、人品好的人交往，自己的人生路才能越走越顺。 <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4489406109137749:1022-article:1022%3A2309404489406110105734:page_100206_home:2803301701:4489406109137749:2803301701" title="【夜读】认清一个人，看这三点就够了" href="http://t.cn/A6ZlRIr7" alt="http://t.cn/A6ZlRIr7" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_longwb">°</i>【夜读】认清一个人，看这三点就够了</a> ​​​​                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

                <div class="WB_ani_loading" node-type="layer_loading"><svg width="100%" height="100%" version="1.1" viewBox="0 0 40 40"><circle cx="20" cy="20" fill="#fff" fill-opacity="0.2" r="20"></circle><circle class="c" cx="20" cy="20" fill-opacity="0" r="19" stroke="#fff" stroke-width="2" stroke-dasharray="120"></circle></svg></div>
            </div>
            <div class="WB_feed_spec_info SW_fun">
                <div class="WB_feed_spec_cont">
                    <h4 class="WB_feed_spec_tit W_autocut">【夜读】认清一个人，看这三点就够了</h4>
                                            <div class="WB_feed_spec_brieftxt"><span class="S_txt2">好的修养，不仅体现在大是大非面前，还体现在待人接物的细节中。</span></div>
                                    </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <!-- /LinkCard6 -->
                                                                                                                                            </div>
    </div>
        <!-- super card-->

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【心疼<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/ee/2018new_beishang_org.png" title="[悲伤]" alt="[悲伤]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">四川<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%95%91%E7%81%AB%E5%89%8D%E7%BA%BF%E6%AD%A6%E8%AD%A6%E5%B8%A6%E7%83%9F%E7%86%8F%E5%A6%86%E5%85%A5%E7%9D%A1%23&amp;from=default">#救火前线武警带烟熏妆入睡#</a>】四川凉山西昌森林火灾发生后，武警凉山支队机动一中队官兵第一时间赶往火场，是最早投入灭火战斗的队伍之一。一天的任务结束后，战士们累到极点，席地而坐，靠着就睡着了。致敬逆行的勇士们，每次出征都要平安回来！<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4489398638439383:1034-video:1034%3A4489355046354948:page_100206_home:2803301701:4489398638439383:2803301701" title="央视军事的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6ZlvoRQ" alt="http://t.cn/A6ZlvoRQ" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>央视军事的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                                <a name="4489391390890019" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IBvtF3Jx9?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-02 22:29" date="1585837779000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4489391390890019:fromprofile"> 2020-4-2 22:29</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%99%AE%E4%BA%AC%E5%AE%A3%E5%B8%83%E4%BF%84%E7%BD%97%E6%96%AF%E5%BB%B6%E9%95%BF%E5%81%87%E6%9C%9F%E8%87%B34%E6%9C%8830%E6%97%A5%23&amp;from=default">#普京宣布俄罗斯延长假期至4月30日#</a>】俄罗斯总统普京当地时间4月2日下午4时发表全国讲话时宣布，将<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BF%84%E7%BD%97%E6%96%AF%E5%B8%A6%E8%96%AA%E4%BC%91%E5%81%87%E5%BB%B6%E9%95%BF%E8%87%B34%E6%9C%8830%E6%97%A5%23&amp;from=default">#俄罗斯带薪休假延长至4月30日#</a>。普京表示，全世界范围内，包括俄罗斯境内，疫情尚未过去。因此决定将假期延长至4月30日。此前，为防止新冠病毒蔓延，普京曾宣布3月28日至4月3日全俄带薪休假。（人民 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IBvtF3Jx9" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4489391390890019:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4489391390890019&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

</script>

                                                                                                             【<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\"
